name: City Defender (saurabhkgp)
description:
Save your City from deadly attack with your powerful Jet. Your enemies are no less, but you have got an edge over them. The enemies cant beat when you are on dope. Complete the levels and beat the High Score. While you are playing, we are developing more and more levels.

Controls:

Spacebar to Shoot
Up, Down, Left, Right Arrows Keys to move.
